description: The root issue was a glitchy taskbar that emerged due to changes made in a prior Windows preview update. This problem was addressed specifically in the patches KB-5039211 and KB-5039212. KB-5039211 introduced a new Snipping Tool feature for Windows 10 22H2, while KB-5039212 provided a fix for the reported taskbar glitch affecting Windows 11 23H2. Such bugs can significantly hamper user experience and are crucial to rectify promptly in enterprise environments. Keeping systems updated with the latest patches helps mitigate these issues and ensures smoother operation.
